item.description:
Dear meditators....following the meditation on Sunday July 17, you may want to join us for a sound healing.  This is a sound healing with psychoacustacle background music, live crystal singing bowls, ohm tuning forks, chimes and gong to clear the entire energy system. Also specific activation for the 3rd eye and crown chakras and deepening the connection to your 8th chakra, above the crown. We will also do a sound and light meditation and everyone will receive the Oneness Blessing.

This is a free evening, 7-8:30 pm. Donations are gratefully accepted to help with space rental for those of you who wish to donate. All are welcome.

For other programs at A Higher Balance see www.AHigherBalance.com

Judy Christine Copp, M.Ed, RPP, RMT provides energy healing and spiritual programs.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block, go up one flight to 6B

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Sound healing and activation for 6th, 7th & 8th chakras
